Field.name: Description
Field.p: Type of entity. This field supports both entity and group types. See entity_type.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Entityâ€™s current display name. While display names may change over time, the data tracks only the most recent display name.

Item.name: environment
Item.Field: The kind of environment the entity exists in. Can be one of: {% include genFiles/environment_type.html %}

Item.name: state
Item.Field: The current state of the entity. Can be one of: {% include genFiles/entity_state.html %}

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Information that is specific for the given entity type. This can be null for an entity that has no attributes. Can be one of:

Field.name: Description
Field.p: A list of metrics for the entity. Can be empty for an entity with no commodities. See metric.

Item.name: related

Field.name: Description
Field.p: A topology timestamp for when this entity first appeared.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: A topology timestamp for when this entity last appeared.
A value of 9999-12-31T23:59:59 means the entity still exists in latest market cycle.
